message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth $12,000 to you at a competitive price.
Thanks for the offer Alice.  $11,500 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to consider your offer at $10,800. This is the highest price I can go for now, given the value of the product to you.
